name: Souper Enchiladas
ingredients: 1 can condensed SOUP: bean with bacon
SEASONING: 4 oz. can chopped green chilies, drained
instructions: Heat oil in skillet and fry tortillas 2-3 seconds on each side. Drain on paper towels, reserving about 2 Tbsp. oil. Over medium heat stir oil, onion and garlic until tender. Stir in SOUP, MEAT, water, cumin and SEASONING. Heat through.

Spoon about 1/3 c. mixture onto each tortilla and roll up. Arrange in 8x12" baking dish. Pour salsa over tortillas and top with cheese. Cover with foil and bake 25 minutes at 325 degrees. Uncover and bake 5 minutes more.
